## Workflow.outputObservable() method

Observe an output name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
outputObservable(name?: string): Maybe<TableObservable>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The output to observe. If falsy, this will observe the default output of the final step. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Maybe](./workflow.maybe.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TableObservable](./workflow.tableobservable.md)<!-- -->&gt;
